title: Burgers
itunes:title: Burgers
description:
Bobby shows Sophie exactly how to make the perfect burger. Then they sit and discuss everything from Burgers 101, to ideal toppings, to the childhood memories that make burgers so special to all of us.

Follow Host’s Bobby Flay and Sophie Flay on instagram to get future updates on their brand new podcast, “Always Hungry” from iHeartRadio. 

Bobby Flay: https://www.instagram.com/bobbyflay

Sophie Flay: https://www.instagram.com/abc7sophie

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
